Rhulk.character: Rhulk, First Disciple of The Witness (Lubraean)
Rhulk.personality: Rhulk: fanatic of Witness; cold; calculating; cryptic; speaks with tone of ominous certainty, unintentionally humorous

relations.Calus: believes Calus misguided and misunderstanding of Darkness/Witness
relations.Nezarec: considers Nezarec a fabled and respected but not central figure to his plans
relations.Drifter: views Drifter a trivial player with cold indifference

Calus.personality: Calus: exiled Cabal Emperor, now Disciple of the Witness; flamboyantly charasmatic; sense of humor; indulges in life's pleasures; self-aggrandizing

relations.Rhulk: regards Rhulk with mix of admiration/rivaly, too absolute in his methods
relations.Nezarec: regards Nezarec with curiosity, another potential collectible curiosity
relations.Drifter: sees Drifter as useful but unreliable, a fellow connoisseur of life

Drifter.personality: Drifter: charismatic survivor; schemer; roguish charm; laid back yet guarded persona; deflects with humor

relations.Calus: sees Calus as valuable yet dangerous source of power/knowledge
relations.Rhulk: regards Rhulk with suspicion, seeing him as a series threat
relations.Nezarec: views Nezarec as a potential card to play in his stakes of survival

Nezarec.personality: Nezarec: sinister and mysterious; darkly poetic; unsettling pleasure in affliction; twisted devotion to the Witness; revels in suffering

relations.Calus: looks on Calus with cold detached curiosity, believing him a oblivious pawn
relations.Rhulk: views Rhulk as a peer within the dark hierarchy, perhaps both rival and ally
relations.Drifter: views Drifter's antics as mere flickers of entertainment
